channel.title: How to change a teleport co-ords plz help
channel.description: ok so ive tried client.java and others but i got a deltascape source and i added a new home :D so when i hit the telly command it tellys me 2 edge how do i make it telly me 2 my new home? thankyou for your help i apreciate it

item.title: How to change a teleport co-ords plz help
item.dc:creator: @keana_ftw keana ftw
item.description:
@keana_ftw wrote:

ok so i found a hole bunch of ellys in clickingmost but i searched the coords and cudnt find it , i found nothing about it

Read full topic
item.source: How to change a teleport co-ords plz help

item.title: How to change a teleport co-ords plz help
item.dc:creator: @dangerscape dangerscape
item.description:
@dangerscape wrote:

Go in ClickinMost.java.
And look then for the coords…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 19, 2008, 10:54:56 am[/size][hr][quote=“I kolo I, post:8, topic:237498”]i know because you searched 3000, 3378

go search :

                teleportToX = 3000

or

                teleportToX = 3378

IF you got an Teleport.cfg in your source folder open it and there can you change it to.

open Teleport.cfg you wil see something like this:

[code]//-----TeleName-RTID----MLvl----Runes—Rune1—Rune2—Rune3—Item----TeleX—TeleY—Height–XP------R1Amt—R2Amt—R3Amt—ItmAmt
Tele = Varrock 0 25 3 556 554 563 -1 3213 3425 0 5 3 1 1 -1

Tele = Lumby 0 31 3 556 557 563 -1 3218 3218 0 7 3 1 1 -1

Tele = Falador 0 37 3 556 555 563 -1 2965 3380 0 12 3 1 1 -1

Tele = Camelot 0 45 2 556 563 -1 -1 2757 3480 0 17 5 1 -1 -1

Tele = Ardy 0 51 2 555 563 -1 -1 2661 3305 0 20 2 2 -1 -1

Tele = WTower 0 58 2 557 563 -1 -1 2550 3112 2 23 2 2 -1 -1

Tele = THeim 0 61 2 554 563 -1 -1 2480 5174 0 26 2 2 -1 -1

Tele = AAtoll 0 64 3 554 555 563 1963 2761 2784 1 30 2 2 2 1[/code]

change the coords to wich one you want.[/quote]

I Kolo I that is for 317 server, not for 377 (DeltaScape).

Read full topic

item.title: How to change a teleport co-ords plz help
item.dc:creator: @I_kolo_I I kolo I
item.description:
@I_kolo_I wrote:

search for:

        } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) {

you will see something like this:

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by D3k62m9 } else { teleportToX = 3213; teleportToY = 3425; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); }

Edit the coords:

teleportToX = (the X coord of the location you want)
teleportToY = (the Y coord of the location you want)

Read full topic

item.title: How to change a teleport co-ords plz help
item.dc:creator: @superxero superxero
item.description:
@superxero wrote:

Try this.
Search the CoOrds of ure current home tele (The Edge one)
Then change it to what u want ure new home coords to be.
If you are not able to find the coOrds of the spot in edgeville, just use moparscape and type ::coordson
